  • Method Details

    • updateTowers

      public boolean updateTowers(int numTowers)
      Increments this board's towers by the number specified
      Parameters:
      numTowers - the value to increment the towers by
      Returns:
      true if this board has no more towers

    • getNumberOfTowers

      public int getNumberOfTowers()

    • getTowerColor

      public TeamEnum getTowerColor()

    • moveFromEntranceToHall

      public StudentEnum moveFromEntranceToHall()
      Remove Student from studentsAtEntrance. Add 1 Student to right position of StudentsPerTable. Resets selectedEntranceStudentPos.
      Returns:
      moved student's type

    • moveFromEntranceToIsland

      public void moveFromEntranceToIsland(IslandGroup chosenIsland)
      Removes the right student from studentsAtEntrance. Adds 1 student, of the right type, in chosenIsland. Resets selectedEntranceStudentPos.
      Parameters:
      chosenIsland - the IslandGroup selected by the current player

    • moveFromCloud

      public void moveFromCloud(Cloud chosenCloud)
      call empty from chosenCloud and add the elements of the obtained collection to studentsAtEntrance collection
      Parameters:
      chosenCloud - the Cloud chosen by the current player

    • moveFromHallToEntrance

      public void moveFromHallToEntrance(StudentEnum chosenTable) throws FullEntranceException
      Moves a student from the hall to the entrance of the board
      Parameters:
      chosenTable - the table from which to extract a student
      Throws:
      FullEntranceException - if the entrance is full and no more students can be added

    • removeNStudentsFromHall

      public List<StudentEnum> removeNStudentsFromHall(StudentEnum colorStudent, int numToSubtract)
      Remove N strudents from Hall and if Hall.size() < N remove all students in Hall
      Parameters:
      colorStudent - != NOSTUDENT
      numToSubtract - >= 0
      Returns:
      List of students removed

    • addToEntrance

      public void addToEntrance(StudentEnum studentToAdd)
      Adds a student to the entrance in the first available space
      Parameters:
      studentToAdd - the color of the student to add

    • removeFromEntrance

      public StudentEnum removeFromEntrance(int position)
      Removes the selected student from the Entrance.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the student to remove
      Returns:
      The removed student

    • addToHall

      public void addToHall(StudentEnum student)
      Adds a student to the hall in the right table
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student to add

    • removeFromHall

      public StudentEnum removeFromHall(StudentEnum color)
      Remove one student from Hall with chosen color If there is no students at Hall, return NOSTUDENT
      Parameters:
      color - the table which to remove the student
      Returns:
      Student with chosen color or NOSTUDENT if the table is already empty
